team_0190_botan_02:
The six of us thought up that catchphrase back
when we created the team.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_03: It’s so cringey it’s perfect, you know?[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_04:
Anyway...about the LP thing. I thought I was
going down big-time for hacking the League\r
Point system, but looks like I got away with it...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_05:
The Pokémon League said they’ll waive my debt
if I do some volunteer engineering for them.\c
They even asked me to come work for them after
I graduate, if you can believe that.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_06:
Director Clavell and that Geeta lady kept
complimenting me, like, a weird amount.\c
Apparently, I have “outstanding talent” or
something...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_08:
Sorry for calling you out here to meet like this.
I’m still not so great with people face-to-face...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_09: I never seem to find the right words, but, um...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_11:
You saved Team Star—and my friends along
with it.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_12:
I know words won’t ever be enough to properly
thank you for all you’ve done, so here...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_13: I’m sure you’ll put this to good use.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_15:
I want to repay the debt I owe you. If you ever
think of a way I can do that, just let me know.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_16: I’m great with machines and hacking and stuff...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_17:
[VAR BD06(0000)]So next time, I’ll be the one helping you,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0190_botan_18: Be seeing you, then. Hasta la vistar! ☆[VAR 0114(0008)]
